# Blogging Tools

<span style="color: #ffffff">Tools are the backbone of any great blog or blogger. Our team at Blogging Guide assembled the list of resources below to help new writers and content creators identify the essential tools used by most top bloggers. Additionally, all of the tools listed below have been tested by our team, and many are used across our own website.

# <span class="dsm-text-notation-before">1. </span><span class="dsm-text-notation-middle" data-notation="[{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;underline&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;#08e0c0&quot;,&quot;stroke-width&quot;:&quot;3&quot;,&quot;iterations&quot;:&quot;3&quot;,&quot;brackets&quot;:&quot;left|right&quot;,&quot;viewport&quot;:&quot;80%&quot;,&quot;delay&quot;:&quot;0ms&quot;}]">Start</span> <span class="dsm-text-notation-after"> a Blog</span>

Read our **quick 3 step guide** which outlines the basic steps and tools used **to create a high powered blog in under an hour**.

#### Step 1. Buy Webhosting & Pick Domain<span class="dsm-badges dsm-badges-after">~5 Minutes</span>

The first step in creating a blog is going to [**Bluehost**](https://www.bluehost.com/track/beconsulting). Bluehost provides web-hosting services and offers free domains with all their hosting packages. Domain

In this first step you will choose your blog name (domain name) and buy your blog hosting.

- **Step 1.** Go to the [**Bluehost website**](https://www.bluehost.com/track/beconsulting)[](http://www.bluehost.com/track/beconsulting) and click the **“Get Started Now”** button.
- **Step 2.** Select the **Basic plan**.
- **Step 3.** Pick your domain name and enter it into the “**New Domain”** box.
- **Step 4.** Create your Bluehost account.

<a href="http://www.bluehost.com/track/beconsulting" class="et_pb_button et_pb_custom_button_icon et_pb_button_0 et_hover_enabled et_pb_bg_layout_light">Try Bluehost and Get a Free Domain!</a>

#### Step 2. Launch WordPress Website<span class="dsm-badges dsm-badges-after">~10 Minutes</span>

After you log in to the account, [**Bluehost**](https://www.bluehost.com/track/beconsulting) will offer a 4-step process to help you create a blog. Instead, scroll down and choose the “**Skip this step**” button (we will install our own theme later).

Once you click the “**Skip the step**” button you will be taken to your Bluehost account page.

After you click the “**Launch My Site**” button, your blog will go live! Bluehost will install WordPress automatically. Once the install is complete click the blue “WordPress” button to be logged-in to the administrator area of your blog.

If you already have hosting, or your own domain, my recommendation would be to use [**EasyWordPress**](https://dashboard.easywp.com/r/Y5qma).

<a href="https://dashboard.easywp.com/r/Y5qma" class="et_pb_button et_pb_custom_button_icon et_pb_button_1 et_hover_enabled et_pb_bg_layout_light">Try Easy WordPress!</a>

#### Step 3. Customize and Design Website<span class="dsm-badges dsm-badges-after">~30 Minutes</span>

Next you are going to choose a WordPress Theme for your website.

To do this, go to the [**Elegant Themes website**](https://www.elegantthemes.com/affiliates/idevaffiliate.php?id=63043). Elegant Themes offers the WordPress Theme, [**Divi**](https://www.elegantthemes.com/affiliates/idevaffiliate.php?id=63043), which you will be installing on your site. Click on the “**Pricing**” button in the upper right hand corner of the screen. Using our [**promotional link**](https://www.elegantthemes.com/affiliates/idevaffiliate.php?id=63043), you will see two options:

> **$89 per Year or $249 for Lifetime Access. Regardless of which option you choose you will be offered a free 30 day trial, allowing you to test Divi absolutely risk free.  
> **

Next, download the [**Divi theme**](https://www.elegantthemes.com/affiliates/idevaffiliate.php?id=63043). Upload this theme to WordPress and install it. You will now have the infrastructure in place to create an awesome blog.

<a href="https://www.elegantthemes.com/affiliates/idevaffiliate.php?id=63043" class="et_pb_button et_pb_custom_button_icon et_pb_button_2 et_hover_enabled et_pb_bg_layout_light">Try Divi Risk Free for 30 Days!</a>

#### [Medium Course | Master Medium](https://gumroad.com/l/medium-course)

Our **Medium Writing Course** is a course created to help writers learn how to use Medium and how to make money through the Medium Partner Program.

[<span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><img src="data:image/png;base64," class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone wp-image-14775 et-animated" width="128" height="127" /></span>](https://medium.com/active-publications)

#### [Active Pubs | Find Medium Publications](https://medium.com/active-publications)

**Active Publications** is a compilation of active Medium publications accepting article submissions. The publications are organized by topic and theme.

[<span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><img src="data:image/png;base64," alt="Substack icon, substack logo, substack orange, substack favicon, substack brand" class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone wp-image-6556 et-animated" width="138" height="136" /></span>](https://play.ht/?via=casey)

#### [Add Audio Narration to Medium Blog Posts](https://play.ht/?via=casey)

Play.ht is an online text to speech & realistic AI voice generator. Simply enter your blog posts’ text and in minutes you will have a realistic narration of your article.\*\*  
\*\*

[<span class="et_pb_image_wrap"><img src="" alt="Substack icon, substack logo, substack orange, substack favicon, substack brand" class="et-waypoint et_pb_animation_top et_pb_animation_top_tablet et_pb_animation_top_phone wp-image-7121 et-animated" sizes="(max-width: 750px) 100vw, 750px" width="750" height="750" /></span>](https://play.ht/?via=casey)

#### [Medium Article Editable Title Templates](https://play.ht/?via=casey)

Our **Custom Medium Title Images **consist of a set of 50 editable PowerPoint templates, allowing writers to create custom blog banners for their articles.\*\*  
\*\*

# <span class="dsm-text-notation-before">6. WordPress </span><span class="dsm-text-notation-middle" data-notation="[{&quot;type&quot;:&quot;underline&quot;,&quot;color&quot;:&quot;#08e0c0&quot;,&quot;stroke-width&quot;:&quot;3&quot;,&quot;iterations&quot;:&quot;3&quot;,&quot;brackets&quot;:&quot;left|right&quot;,&quot;viewport&quot;:&quot;80%&quot;,&quot;delay&quot;:&quot;0ms&quot;}]">Plugins</span>
